mapper.select: select room_no as roomNo, member_id as memberId, occupied, pet_chkin as petChkin, pet_chkout as petChkout, pet_days as petDays from pet_room_reserve where to_date(#{checkinDate}) >= to_date(pet_Chkin) and to_date(#{checkinDate}) < to_date(pet_Chkout)

select room_no as roomNo, member_id as memberId, occupied, pet_chkin as petChkin, pet_chkout as petChkout, pet_days as petDays from pet_room_reserve where (to_date(pet_chkin) <= to_date(#{checkinDate}) and to_date(#{checkinDate}) < to_date(pet_chkout)) or (to_date(pet_chkin) < to_date(#{checkoutDate}) and to_date(#{checkoutDate}) <= to_date(pet_chkout)) or (to_date(pet_chkin) >= to_date(#{checkinDate}) and to_date(#{checkoutDate}) > to_date(pet_chkout))
select TO_CHAR(#{stay_period}*(sum(to_number(room_charge,'999,999,999'))),'999,999,999') from pet_room where room_no in(#{roomNo},#{roomNo2})

select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from( select pb_no as pbNo, pb_title as pbTitle, pb_writer as pbWriter, pb_content as pbContent, pb_date as pbDate, star_score as starScore from pet_board order by pb_no desc )n)where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count ( * ) as cnt from pet_board
mapper.insert: insert into pet_board values( pb_seq.nextval, #{pbTitle}, #{pbWriter}, #{pbContent}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{starScore} )
mapper.select: select file_no as fileNo, filename, filepath, pb_no as pbNo from pb_file_tbl where pb_no = #{pb_no}
